entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 then light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
